[HighwayStreetIntersectionSolutions]
;
;DDRHW Specials (added by Tarkus, 06072012)
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00020002,0x57531000,1,0
TYPE2=0x00020000,0x02000200,0x57531000,2,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x00020002,0x57531000,3,0
TYPE4=0x00000002,0x02000200,0x57531000,0,0

;piece 150
;
TYPE1=0x02040200,0x00020002,0x02015000,0,0

TYPE4=0x00020402,0x02000200,0x02015000,3,0
;
;piece 153
;
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x00020002,0x02015300,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x02000200,0x02015300,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x00020002,0x02015300,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x02000200,0x02015300,3,0
TYPE5=0x01000003,0x00020002,0x02015300,0,1
TYPE6=0x00000301,0x02000200,0x02015300,3,1
TYPE7=0x00030100,0x00020002,0x02015300,2,1
TYPE8=0x03010000,0x02000200,0x02015300,1,1
;
;piece 154
;
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x00020002,0x02015400,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x02000200,0x02015400,1,0
TYPE3=0x01030103,0x00020002,0x02015400,0,1
TYPE4=0x03010301,0x02000200,0x02015400,1,1
;
;
;Added 060905 ~ Tropod
;a number of these junctions contain unfixable pathing issues. not all of them contain pathing issues though. depend on the rotation, i.e. which way the paths are going in conjunction with one another.
;Paths are not working properly like they should be ~ faulty path routing to blame.
;diagonal highway,orthogonal street + Intersection
;case 1
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02020202,0x5F571000,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x02020202,0x5F571000,1,0
;case 2
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02020202,0x5F571200,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000301,0x02020202,0x5F571200,2,0
TYPE3=0x00030100,0x02020202,0x5F571200,3,0
TYPE4=0x01000003,0x02020202,0x5F571200,1,0
;diagonal highway,orthogonal street T Intersection
; 1a
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02020200,0x5F571100,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x02020002,0x5F571100,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x02000202,0x5F571100,2,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020202,0x5F571100,3,0
; 1b
TYPE1=0x01030103,0x02020200,0x5F571100,2,1
TYPE2=0x03010301,0x02020002,0x5F571100,1,1
TYPE3=0x01030103,0x02000202,0x5F571100,0,1
TYPE4=0x03010301,0x00020202,0x5F571100,3,1
; 2a
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02020200,0x5F571300,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x02020002,0x5F571300,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x02000202,0x5F571300,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x00020202,0x5F571300,3,0
; 2b
TYPE1=0x00000301,0x02020200,0x5F571600,2,1
TYPE2=0x00030100,0x02020002,0x5F571600,1,1
TYPE3=0x03010000,0x02000202,0x5F571600,0,1
TYPE4=0x01000003,0x00020202,0x5F571600,3,1
; 2c
TYPE1=0x01000003,0x02020200,0x5F571600,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000301,0x02020002,0x5F571600,1,0
TYPE3=0x00030100,0x02000202,0x5F571600,2,0
TYPE4=0x03010000,0x00020202,0x5F571600,3,0
; 2d

TYPE3=0x01000003,0x02000202,0x5F571300,0,1
TYPE4=0x00000301,0x00020202,0x5F571300,3,1
; diagonal highway,orthogonal street dead end
; 1a
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02000000,0x5F571800,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x00000002,0x5F571800,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x00000200,0x5F571800,2,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020000,0x5F571800,3,0
